customer_name: Vermont Museum of Natural History Inc.

citations.narrative:
The heat lamp in one enclosure had an exposed electrical cord the birds could access, and the metal shade was
unprotected. Birds could potentially land on the metal shade and become injured, or bite on the electrical cord and be
injured. The facility must ensure the enclosure protects the birds from injury.
Correct by 01/23/25

Two perches in the merlin/broadwing hawk enclosure had worn and frayed coverings. Damaged perch coverings may
present an entrapment or ingestion risk. The facility must ensure that worn materials are replaced as often as necessary.
Correct by 01/23/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.150(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The heat lamp in one enclosure had an exposed electrical cord the birds could access, and the metal shade was 
unprotected. Birds could potentially land on the metal shade and become injured, or bite on the electrical cord and be 
injured. The facility must ensure the enclosure protects the birds from injury. 
 
Correct by 01/23/25 
3.153(a)(1)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Two perches in the merlin/broadwing hawk enclosure had worn and frayed coverings. Damaged perch coverings may 
present an entrapment or ingestion risk. The facility must ensure that worn materials are replaced as often as necessary. 
 
Correct by 01/23/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
